scripts.test:develop: yarn build-plugin && start-server-and-test ui-theme-example:develop http://localhost:8001 test:run
scripts.test:production: yarn build-plugin && start-server-and-test ui-theme-example:production http://localhost:8001 test:run
scripts.ui-theme-example:develop: yarn clean && yarn workspace ui-theme-example gatsby develop --port=8001
scripts.ui-theme-example:production: yarn clean && yarn workspace ui-theme-example gatsby build && yarn workspace ui-theme-example gatsby serve --port=8001
